Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 64th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1980...
Injured on 8/7/1980 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/14/1982 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 4/12/1983 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Traded from Philadelphia to Cleveland on 5/12/1986 (Going to PHI: P R. Botting. Going to CLE: P M. Jeffcoat, CF G. Roenicke)...
Earned first career win on 8/4/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1990, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 4/18/1993 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/19/1994 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 8/19/1995 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 5/7/1996 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 4-5 weeks...
